title: Doctor Droid (YC W23) Is Hiring
description: Article URL: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/doctor-droid/jobs/2v9x6QW-ai-lead Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=43394621 Points: 0 # Comments: 0
author: TheBengaluruGuy
excerpt: We are looking for an AI lead to join our team. What are the kind of problems you’ll be solving: Designing architecture & managing orchestration for AI Agents & Subagents at scale (companies build one/more agents to monitor their infrastructure using our platform) Building evals and improving reliability/consistency of agents Tackling problems related to AI infrastructure like — improving agent response latency, handling edge cases, context window related issues and more. Here’s what we are looking for: Atleast 4 years of ML experience & 1.5+ years of experience working with LLMs in production use-cases (agent orchestration experience is required) Ready to work from office in Bangalore, 6 days a week. Completely involved in development & getting hands dirty. We do not have any mgmt. What will make you a perfect candidate: Additionally, atleast one year of backend engineering experience and have been on-call.

html:
Your best friend in production.

AI Lead

₹4.5M - ₹5M INR / 1.00% - 2.00%

Location

Bengaluru, KA, IN / Bengaluru, Karnataka, IN

Connect directly with founders of the best YC-funded startups.

Apply to role ›

About the role

We are looking for an AI lead to join our team.

What are the kind of problems you’ll be solving:

  • Designing architecture & managing orchestration for AI Agents & Subagents at scale (companies build one/more agents to monitor their infrastructure using our platform)
  • Building evals and improving reliability/consistency of agents
  • Tackling problems related to AI infrastructure like — improving agent response latency, handling edge cases, context window related issues and more.

Here’s what we are looking for:

  • Atleast 4 years of ML experience & 1.5+ years of experience working with LLMs in production use-cases (agent orchestration experience is required)
  • Ready to work from office in Bangalore, 6 days a week.
  • Completely involved in development & getting hands dirty. We do not have any mgmt.

What will make you a perfect candidate:

  • Additionally, atleast one year of backend engineering experience and have been on-call.

About the interview

  • We will do a quick screening of the individual
    • This involves 1:1 calls with the founders & founding engineers
  • If we like it, we will do a paid 1-2 week trial with a user on a problem statement
  • If all goes as per expectation, we will be keen to onboard the individual

About Doctor Droid

What we do

Doctor Droid is building a smart assistant to help engineering teams accelerate investigation during production incidents. Our platform helps companies reduce downtimes and keep their developers more productive. We are an Open Source platform with users across the globe.

Vision

Think if anyone in the team can debug an average production issue without requiring to involve a senior engineer (or a team of engineers?). Wouldn't that be wonderful? That's what we are working towards.

Funding

To work towards our vision, we couldn’t have been more grateful for having some amazing investors. We are lucky enough to be supported by Accel and we were part of Y-Combinator’s W23 batch.

In case you are interested to know more about the team, check this page. If you're passionate about building tools to improve lives of other developers, we might be a good fit.

Doctor Droid

Founded:2022

Team Size:6

Status:Active

Location:San Francisco

Founders
